channel.title: Hosting a 508 but cant connect to own ip? =[]
channel.description:
so im hosting my friends 508 and I guess the client im using wont let me connect to my own ip. ( i have tried many 508 clients )
I open the client and it starts loading but never finishes.. it stops at "Connecting to Update Server".
after a little is says "error_game_js5connect" in the command prompt.
Can anyone help me figure out how to play? I dont want to just host the server I want to play =\.
thanks =[] :confused: :confused:

item.title: Hosting a 508 but cant connect to own ip? =[]
item.dc:creator: @lol_u_owned lol u owned
item.description:
@lol_u_owned wrote:

It should work if you use 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

like an ip changing client? yea… i tried the one for the server (rawgamerz.no-ip.info, and my own ip cuz its the one the servers on…)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 05:30:47 pm[/size][hr]it wont let me connect with the same ip or my public ip =[]
